event.title: was renamed Malaga later that year

data.event: The post office, originally named Tokay, opened in 1886 and was renamed Malaga later that year.
The post office closed in 1964, and reopened in 1965.
The post office closed in 1964, and reopened in 1965.
The 2010 United States Census reported that Malaga had a population of 947.
The Census reported that 947 people (100% of the population) lived in households, 0 (0%) lived in non-institutionalized group quarters, and 0 (0%) were institutionalized.
